title: The Veil of Truth
description: In this exciting second book of the Shiva XIV series, Ayn finds himself living a new life as he struggles with whether he is truly a God reborn or if he is a mere mortal. Meanwhile, Yol Notama, the magnanimous leader of the Tah rebellion, hatches his epic plans on Deius as Reese and Pei lurk in the shadows as Lirhan spies.The stakes are high, and the battle for survival has only just begun!
author: Lyra Shanti
